summary: AFTER ONLY 512 MILES THE MAGNETS CAME OFF THE FLYWHEEL CAUSING THE ATV NOT TO START. UPON CONTACTING ARCTIC CAT ABOUT THE PROBLEM, THEY SAID THEY KNEW IT WAS A PROBLEM BUT SINCE THEY DID NOT MAKE THE ENGINE, DID NOT RECALL OR LET PEOPLE KNOW OF THE PROBLEM. THEY OFFER NO HELP IN GETTING THE FLYWHEEL FIXED! THIS IS A $1000.00 REPAIR BILL. SUZUKI  MADE THE ENGINE. I COULD NOT FIND ANY TYPE OF RECALL ON THIS PROBLEM EITHER FROM THE MANUFACTURE WEB SITES OR THE CPSC.GOV WEB SITE. WAS TOLD SINCE NO ONE GOT HURT, THEY DID NOT SEE IT AS A PROBLEM. THIS INFORMATION WAS FROM ARCTIC CAT.  *TR
